Beginnings_key1:
Apne Stories directory mein ek text file banaye jisme aap apni story likhenge.
Iss text file ka naam apne story ke naam par rakh de.
Beginnings_key2: Jaise mere story ka naam Mahabharata.txt ho sakta hai.
Beginnings_key3: Apne story ke file mein story ki beginning likho. Story ke beginning mein generally hum apne characters aur context ko introduce karte hain.
Beginnings_key5: Apne story ki beginning likho. Saath mein hi ye ensure karo ki aapke dono peers apni apni story ki beginning likh rahe hain.
